extendedInfo.description: The 640-554 Implementing Cisco IOS Network Security (IINS) exam is associated with the CCNA Security certification. This exam tests a candidate's knowledge of securing Cisco routers and switches and their associated networks. It leads to validated skills for installation, troubleshooting and monitoring of network devices to maintain integrity, confidentiality and availability of data and devices and develops competency in the technologies that Cisco uses in its security infrastructure.Candidates can prepare for this exam by taking the Implementing Cisco IOS Network Security (IINS)course.App features: There are three main functions focusing on program Training The questions are categorized according to the main topics in the CCNA program to strengthen candidates' knowledgeIn this section, candidate can choose the number of questions in order or random, set the countdown timer for each practicing item. Exam  	Candidate will have the opportunity to test with the number of questions in the same time as the CCNA exam. After completing, the result will be notified immediately   History  	Candidate can review the result of previous examThere are three types of questions that app can support:â¢	Single choiceâ¢	Multiple choiceThe following topics are general guidelines for the content likely to be included on the Implementing Cisco IOS Network Security (IINS) exam. However, other related topics may also appear on any specific delivery of the exam. In order to better reflect the contents of the exam and for clarity purposes, the guidelines below may change at any time without notice.Common Security Threatsâ¢	Describe common security threatsSecurity and Cisco Routersâ¢	Implement security on Cisco routersâ¢	Describe securing the control, data, and management planeâ¢	Describe Cisco Security Managerâ¢	Describe IPv4 to IPv6 transitionAAA on Cisco Devicesâ¢	Implement AAA (authentication, authorization, and accounting)â¢	Describe TACACS+â¢	Describe RADIUSâ¢	Describe AAAâ¢	Verify AAA functionalityIOS ACLsâ¢	Describe standard, extended, and named IP IOS access control lists (ACLs) to filter packetsâ¢	Describe considerations when building ACLsâ¢	Implement IP ACLs to mitigate threats in a networkSecure Network Management and Reportingâ¢	Describe secure network managementâ¢	Implement secure network managementCommon Layer 2 Attacksâ¢	Describe Layer 2 security using Cisco switchesâ¢	Describe VLAN securityâ¢	Implement VLANs and trunkingâ¢	Implement spanning treeCisco Firewall Technologiesâ¢	Describe operational strengths and weaknesses of the different firewall technologiesâ¢	Describe stateful firewallsâ¢	Describe the types of NAT used in firewall technologiesâ¢	Implement zone-based policy firewall using CCPâ¢	Implement the Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA)â¢	Implement Network Address Translation (NAT) and Port Address Translation (PAT)Cisco IPSâ¢	Describe Cisco Intrusion Prevention System (IPS) deployment considerationsâ¢	Describe IPS technologiesâ¢	Configure Cisco IOS IPS using CCPVPN Technologiesâ¢	Describe the different methods used in cryptographyâ¢	Describe VPN technologiesâ¢	Describe the building blocks of IPSecâ¢	Implement an IOS IPSec site-to-site VPN with pre-shared key authenticationâ¢	Verify VPN operationsâ¢	Implement Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) VPN using ASA device manager
